```{r setup}
library(mipledxtractor)
```

## 1. Overview
The main function of this package is to provide a simple method that is able to represent the data staore in an output file of a microplate reader into a tidy data frame. This is a critical point in severals reasearch lines link to molecular biolgy. This package main contribution is orientated to save time and get fast into the analysis of the data.
